privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1.title: 1. Introduction
privacy.section1.content: zouka (hereinafter "this tool") is a tool for resizing and converting images in your browser. This privacy policy explains how information is handled in this tool.
privacy.section2.title: 2. Handling of Image Data
privacy.section2.intro.prefix: Image data loaded into this tool is
privacy.section2.intro.emphasis: processed entirely locally within your browser
privacy.section2.item1: Image content is not sent to any server
privacy.section2.item2: Image content is not saved or recorded
privacy.section2.item3: Image data is deleted when you close the page
privacy.section3.title: 3. About Analytics
privacy.section3.intro: This tool uses the following analytics tools for service improvement.
privacy.section3.ga.label: Google Analytics
privacy.section3.ga.body: Collects statistical information such as visitor count, page views, and device usage
privacy.section3.clarity.label: Microsoft Clarity
privacy.section3.clarity.body: Collects anonymized user interaction patterns (clicks, scrolls, etc.)
privacy.section3.note.prefix: These tools may use cookies, but
privacy.section3.note.emphasis: the content of your image input is never collected
privacy.section3.advanced: Cookies may also be used to create advanced monitoring reports based on tracked events (such as user timelines or funnel reports).
privacy.section3.notice.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è About Microsoft Clarity Session Recording
privacy.section3.notice.content1: Microsoft Clarity has a feature that records user interactions. While we have configured input areas to be masked, we cannot guarantee complete exclusion due to technical limitations.
privacy.section3.notice.content2: If you handle sensitive images, consider blocking third-party cookies in your browser settings or enabling Do Not Track (DNT).
privacy.section4.title: 4. About Cookies
privacy.section4.intro: This tool uses cookies or local storage for the following purposes.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Third-Party Disclosure
privacy.section5.content: Since this tool does not collect image data, no disclosure to third parties is made. Statistical information collected through analytics is handled according to each analytics service's privacy policy.
privacy.section6.title: 6. Contact
privacy.section6.content: For inquiries about this tool and bug reports, please use GitHub Issues.
privacy.section7.title: 7. Amendments
privacy.section7.content: This privacy policy may be amended as necessary. Significant changes will be announced on this tool.
